Hydras/Starstorm:

"WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT!!!!!? WHO'S COMIN????" 
Shouted Hydras when he saw Proto collapsed said "Starstorm, 
take this bot and left him in CR's when he's all right ask him 
about who or what's comming..."

"Yes master"said the femme while she started to drag Proto to  
CR's
